name: Facebook May 2018 Wide Material Design
description:
A flat, modern UI optimized to give you the most space where it counts.
--NEW ADVANCED THEME OPTIONS, SCROLL DOWN AND CLICK ADVANCED OPTIONS-- v5.0 OUT NOW--REWORKED AND OPTIMIZED-- ORIGINAL AM!R theme fix! You might get an interface update before I do so there will be a delay in fixes by a day or two.
additional_info:
Changelog:
v5.1: Fixes bugs on 5.0 release, more code refining. NEW USER OPTIONS IN ADVANCED STYLE SETTINGS 
v5.0: Major code cleanup and optimization. Theme should break less.
v4.4: Overdue bug fix patch before 5.0 release.
v4.3: Lots of issues from new code updates from Facebook fixed.
v4.2: Bugs fixed.
v4.1: Chat bugs fixed and small redesigns.
v4.0: Major UI tuneup. Tons of stuff fixed and redesigned.
v3.3: Bugs and notifications fixed.
v3.2: More Polish to the UI, apps.facebook.com now works correctly.
v3.2: More Polish to the UI, apps.facebook.com now works correctly.
v3.1: Centered images in the feed. Bug fixes
v3.0: Tons of polish to clean up the interface.
v2.4: Videos should work in all situations. More bug fixes.
v2.3: Widened links and videos in the feed. Fixed ads on profiles. Other minor bugs.
v2.2.4: More bug fixes. Chat, ads, and post boxes should be back to normal.
v2.2.3: Small bug in chat fixed.
v2.2.2: Fixed broken right panel on pages.
v2.2.1: Fixed images in the feed being small after last patch.
v2.2: bugs fixed and ads fixed.
v2.1: Widened search bar, smaller gap between the right column and the feed, matching chat tab for small window size.
v2.0: Initial theme fix release.

Found a bug: On official pages the feed overlaps the right column
pagelet_bluebar is too small, logon screen goes on top of blue bar
Fix it so it works with Social Fixer
